name: Allevi, Inc.
description: Developer of 3D bioprinters and bioinks intended to cure disease, eliminate the organ waiting list and reverse climate change. The company's 3D bioprinters and bioinks provide a printer that uses a special ink combined with biomaterials and living cells to build 3D living tissue and miniature human organs to unleash the biological revolution
one_liner: Developer of 3D bioprinters and bioinks intended to cure disease, eliminate the organ waiting list and reverse climate change. The company's 3D bioprinters and bioinks provide a printer that uses a special ink combined with biomaterials and living cells to build 3D living tissue and miniature human organs to unleash the biological revolution
